issue.title: Installed ode headers have wrong path

content.raw: Perhaps the ode headers should not be installed to the `/usr/include/gazebo-2.0/gazebo/` prefix, but rather to `/usr/include/gazebo-2.0/`. This installation is currently done in [deps/opende/CMakeLists.txt](#!/osrf/gazebo/src/af4d473625e8b406ebbbbd4d7c76c03be855c705/deps/opende/CMakeLists.txt?at=default#cl-257) using the `gz_install_includes` macro.
content.html: Perhaps the ode headers should not be installed to the /usr/include/gazebo-2.0/gazebo/ prefix, but rather to /usr/include/gazebo-2.0/. This installation is currently done in deps/opende/CMakeLists.txt using the gz_install_includes macro.
